FileFormat.FormatDescription: DWB is the native format of VariCAD, 3D CAD software used in the field of mechanical engineering.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF, offset 1 0x870100. First byte likely represents software version number with 0x32 being version 7, 0x33 being version 8 and so on. Please contact the PRONOM team if you can improve this signature.
